metadata.title: Seedance 2.0 AI Video Generator | Cinematic AI Video with Native Audio
metadata.description: Seedance 2.0 generates cinematic AI videos with native audio sync, multi-shot storytelling, and multimodal control. Text-to-video & image-to-video in 2K. Try free.
metadata.keywords: Seedance 2.0, AI video generator, text to video, image to video, AI video with audio, cinematic AI video, multi-shot video AI, Seedance AI, AI video maker, video generation, AI film maker, AI video online free, AI short film generator, AI video creation tool, best AI video generator 2026
